select count(ref_num) from refrigerator where id = #{id} and trunc((ref_dday - sysdate)+1)<=3

select r.ref_num, r.id, r.ing_num, i.ing_category, i.ing_name, i.expiry, i.ing_icon, r.inputdate, r.ref_dday, r.ref_storage, r.ref_detail from refrigerator r full outer join ingredient i on r.ing_num = i.ing_num where r.id = #{id} and trunc((ref_dday - sysdate)+1)<=3

select r.ref_num, r.ing_num, r.id, i.ing_category, i.ing_name, i.expiry, i.ing_icon, r.inputdate, r.ref_dday, r.ref_storage, r.ref_detail from refrigerator r full outer join ingredient i on r.ing_num = i.ing_num where r.ref_num = #{refnum} and r.id = #{id}
